vsParam:
I see. In your world,
alchemy could make the entire world full of variety.

Yeah. The most important thing for learning alchemy is talent.
I'd wonder sometimes that how nice it would be if I'm talented.

Uh!? Wait, is that Mimi?
How come her tone is completely different than usual?

And, I heard that alchemy in
this world is very developed.

With the efforts of a whole generation of alchemists...
The later generations will have a happy life.
Ha ha ha, this is also my dream.

I think what you do as an adventurer could also bring happiness
to people without the need to use alchemy, right?

Um, Mimi!
What were you talking about with Jones Wort Sensei?

Oh, looks like you get along
pretty well with [px] and everyone.
Y-yes... They are all very nice to me.

Ha ha ha, it's great to make friends. I hope that you can
maintain a good relationship with [px] and everyone.

J-just nice.
I have a favor to ask of you.

Yeah, [px] has helped me many times with
[px]'s knowledge in alchemy. So...

I want you to synthesize some medicine for me,
so that I can go on adventures confidently...

I see. I'm glad that [px]'s alchemy
can help you.

What...
It doesn't look like you are speaking your mind at all...

After all, I'm...
not good at expressing my feelings...

[px]... I haven't expressed my gratitude for
you frankly. I'm really sorry about that.
Oh no, that's an awful smile!
I am very happy to hear that!

Uh, [px]!?
What are you talking about!?

Ha ha, [px], just show what you can.
Mimi, don't force yourself.

Thanks for your concern,
Mr. Headmaster.

So, [px]...
Could you help me prepare the medicine now?

Wow. You are done.
Um... The quality is pretty good.

Boohoo... It doesn't sound very sincere.
The tone has totally changed!

I'm talking about when you had a conversation with
the headmaster! How come the tones are so different!

You saw nothing, and heard nothing.
All you did was accepting my commission.

I don't want to repeat it. You saw nothing, you heard nothing.
All you did was accepting my commission. Do you understand?

S-so powerful and intimidating!
Help! Sorel!

Ho ho. Turns out Mimi also can
talk like an aristocrat.

Ah, she just told me to forget it.
Didn't you hear that!?

Hey! What do you mean by that!
I am an aristocrat. Of course I'd talk like one!

Uh huh, yeah. Mimi is an aristocrat and
knows how to talk like an aristocrat. That's remarkable.

That's... enough!
What are you talking about, gee!
